author: Time
title: Senate Confirms Jeff Sessions As Attorney General
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Senate Confirms Jeff Sessions As Attorney General The Senate on Wednesday confirmed Sen. Jeff Sessions to be attorney general in the Trump administration despite fierce Democratic opposition to the Alabama Republican over his record on civil rights and immigration.
